column5: Last week my vehicle, boat and our luggage was searched by the Canadian customs personnel crossing at Baudette, MN. Everything was okay except that the issue of medication in the proper containers. Medications must be in the container they were purchased in. In other words, if you have a seven-day daily pillbox you could be fined or not allowed in the country. This came right from the Customs official.
Ditto for crossing from Canada into the US.
